name: PLANNES
description: PLANNES is a game of zero-gravity tennis. As you visit various planets on your spaceship, you are challenged by the planets' national teams! Outsmart your opponents by making full use of your various rackets, each with unique abilities!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5-4950 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
